name: Street Race Hot Pursuit
description:
Lets burn rubbers take out wheels to play an exiting car racing game in town Street Race Hot Pursuit

Time to put paddle on accelerator & drift wheels to push car to its limit. Fantastic cars are here waiting for their drivers and Babes are looking for those fast driving guys.

KEY FEATURES

● Real Extreme Competition
● Extremely Super Cars & Easy Controls
● Incredible Car Upgrades & Customize
● WiFi Single-Player Racing
● Global Circuit Race

GAMEPLAY

● Tilt to steer
● Touch gas button to accelerate
● Touch brake button to slow down

Plenty of cars on track that will make your race a hell route & try to stop you but you need to drift and drive with full throttle, NOS is there to help you out so put out your driving skills and impress a lot of babes to hang out with.

Impressive Features that ll take your breath away

● Highway Tunnels
● Sprints
● Drag
● Drifts
● Sports Car
● Cool Tracks
● Awesome Graphics
● Easy Controls

All this in one package Street Race Hot Pursuit

Product of Super Speed Studios
